title: O&A Animation Festival '08 (opie and anthony June 5th, 20
description:
THE OPIE AND ANTHONY ANIMATION FESTIVAL
Thursday June 5, 2008 @ the Roseland Ballroom
239 West 52nd Street (between Broadway & 8th)
New York, NY
Doors Open: 7pm | Show: 8pm
Show Info:

1. The Opie and Anthony Animation Festival (or whatever we choose to call it) will be held on Thursday, June 5, 2008 in New York City. at Roseland Ballroom.
2. Top animations submitted by fans will win CA$H PRIZES... We have $10,000 total to give away for 1st, 2nd and 3rd prize. Exact amounts coming soon!*
3. LIVE performances by some of the comics you know and love from the O&A Show**


*Ripped from www.animationfestival.net
**Torrent links to animations and a copy of the web site (graphics included).  It doesn\&#039;t contain audio or video of stand-up.

File type: FLV (play standalone with VLC Media Player)
